extendedInfo.description: âThis app has ALL the restaurants I go to and since I started using it I have lost 20 lbs using this app!â - Sarah Hook âââââThe ONLY Restaurant app for iPhone AND Android with over 250 restaurants, fast search, favorites list, and constantly updated menus to help you watch and lose weight!! It has food score values for classic & new systems as well as calories, carbs, protein, fat and sodium values!!!!So you are trying to lose a few pounds and it's going good... BUT it's soooo hard to track when you EAT OUT at restaurants!!! It is so frustrating when you don't know the food score values of the restaurant foods you are eating!! If you are a calorie watcher you will know what I mean!!If you don't track the restaurant foods properly you could RISK all of your hard work and unknowingly gain all those pounds and weight back!! This is the last thing you want if you are trying to lose weight!!!BUT wait... you have your phone with you 96% of the time (except the shower... at least I hope :p) So that means that you have a HUGE database of restaurant food score values with you wherever you GO!! That's exactly what this Restaurant guide app does for you! It gives you all of the restaurant food score values, calories, carbs, protein, and fat scores for ALL of the foods on the menu! This is something everyone watching their weight should have if they want to reach their weight loss goals!Purchase this Restaurant guide app now to ensure your weight loss success and enjoy a long, healthy, and happy life!P.S. This app is on Sale for $3.99 LIMITED TIME ONLY! Regular price $6.99! Get this app now so that your weight decreases and you get the body that want!!!P.P.S Get this app now so that you don't fall off the wagon and jeopardize your weight loss! â Has the LARGEST and MOST UP TO DATE selection of restaurants!â The ONLY Restaurant app with a Favorites List!â The ONLY Restaurant app with a Fast Search!â Lose the belly and get the flat stomach you have always wanted!â Over 250 Restaurants included for your weight loss needs! â Use this app also to know the food score/calories you will consume and what to order. â This app shows you the healthy restaurant foods, plus it gives you the ability to search.â Provides you with food score values(classic and new), calories, carbs, fat, protein of food items of most popular restaurants and fast food chains and growing! â Screen is re-sizable. You can make it smaller or larger using the points of your fingertips. â Check out the screen shots & see for yourself! âââââ - "Great app for anyone trying to lose weight. reviews.title: Appetizing
reviews.comment: I wish that there or like this would just allow me to pick one of these restaurants and I\'d be able to order whatever I\'d like and have it delivered to my address because looking through this app makes me hungry ^_^!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful app
reviews.comment: Like the app very much. Makes things easy to find and its very helpful in terms of letting me plan my meal out and get the best bang for my points.
reviews.author: Julian Rodriguez

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy SII
reviews.comment: Love the app. Please keep adding new places. Especially The Cheesecake Factory, Willie\'s, Pappasito\'s and others here in Texas.
reviews.author: Robin Barker

reviews.title: Simply the best
reviews.comment: I have tried several others but I love this one.
reviews.author: Greg Medley

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Saves me time when I have to eat fast food.
reviews.author: Rise Mitchell

reviews.title: Good to help in weifht loss
reviews.comment: Great app. Gives you all the info you need to make good food choices when eating out.
reviews.author: jose aldrey

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Rated at a 4 only due to having all our fave restaurants with the exception of our #1 favorite, Texas Roadhouse.  Please add it if possible, then our rating will be 5 stars! Great app
reviews.author: Jamie Whitaker

reviews.comment: Love it....great app for Weight watcher people....WW really works!
reviews.author: Ginger Whaley

reviews.title: Much needed if u like to eat out.
reviews.comment: Includes every restaurant u could think of.  All my favorites.  I couldn\'t find nutrition info for a few places anywhere online, but this app has it!
reviews.author: Karen Fitten

reviews.title: Life is easier
reviews.comment: Makes accessing the nutritional information much easier for me to figure out how much insulin I need to administer when we eat out. Thank you!
reviews.author: Mike Harvill

reviews.title: Nutrition info wrong
reviews.comment: The points for points plus program is wrong. Nutritional info is wrong!!! Check website for restaurants and compare, waste of money!!!!
reviews.author: Jen Jones

reviews.title: Need more restaurants! And it should be free
reviews.comment: The need to add more restaurants! Probably 1/2 the places I go I can\'t find and have to research them on line.
reviews.author: Julian McConnie

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: Covers so many restaurants and so easy with the points already calculates.
reviews.author: Jeanette Paredes

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Other than asking every time I open the app to rate the app.....it is a great app. I have used it every single day and it seems very accurate. I recommend it for anyone trying to lose weight.
reviews.author: Amy Workman

reviews.title: Restaurant weight loss
reviews.comment: This App is The Stuff !!! lossed 5 Pounds me First week
reviews.author: Cornelius McDonald

reviews.title: Great information
reviews.comment: Hope they\'ll keep adding more restaurants.
reviews.author: Gregg Holman

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Work good. Wish had more restaurants, but more than any other app I\'ve seen
reviews.author: Robert Justice

reviews.title: Love the app but could be better
reviews.comment: Please add fosters freeze.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: LOVE it just needs new places added daily!!!!
reviews.author: Page Bruce

reviews.comment: Best app ever. Helps me make healthy choices when I eat out. Love this app!
reviews.author: Sann Dee
